question: Which stories have characters specifically categorized under the literature section of the Witcher universe?
answer: The literature category includes characters from various stories such as 'The Last Wish', 'Sword of Destiny', 'Blood of Elves', 'Time of Contempt', 'Baptism of Fire', 'The Tower of the Swallow', 'The Lady of the Lake', 'Something Ends, Something Begins', 'Tales from the world of The Witcher', and 'Szpony i kły'. Additionally, there are characters only mentioned in 'The World of the Witcher'.
